title: 05/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/06/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the inevitable divorce between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers and why he's falling in line with other all-time great quarterbacks at this point in their careers. He believes this team is clearly the leader in the Rodgers sweepstakes and should be driving a hard bargain to land the 3x MVP. He also explains why Kevin Durant is starting to have a career similar to Wilt Chamberlin. Plus, Bears head coach Matt Nagy joins the show to talk about drafting QB Justin Fields and when he will take over as the team's full time starter. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
